00091 void Evaluator::Initialize(){
00092         vectorGt = new vector<string>[getCountGt()];
00093         vectorMs = new vector<string>[getCountMs()];
00094         FileReader fReader;
00095         stringstream filename;
00096         string s;
00097 
00098         for (int i = 0; i < countGt; i++) {
00099 
00100                 filename.str("");
00101                 filename.clear();
00102                 filename << gtBaseName << i+1 << fileExt;
00103                 s=filename.str();
00104                 fReader.toStringVector(s,vectorGt[i]);
00105         }
00106         //cout<<"[Check Point:] "<< "GT file reading done, size: "<< vectorGt[0].size() <<endl;
00107         for (int i = 0; i < countMs; i++) {
00108 
00109                         filename.str("");
00110                         filename.clear();
00111                         filename << msBaseName << i+1 << fileExt;
00112                         s=filename.str();
00113                         fReader.toStringVector(s,vectorMs[i]);
00114         }
00115         //cout<<"[Check Point:] "<< "MS file reading done, size: "<< vectorMs[0].size() <<endl;
00116         initializationStatus=true;
00117 }
00118 
00119 bool Evaluator::IsInitialized(){
00120         return initializationStatus;
00121 }
00122 }
